transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
transcript.content:
TEL ( 0-1 2..
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, TIlE HON P J KEATING MP
KELVIN COE
With the tragic death of Kelvin Coe, Australia has lost one of its, greatest performance
artists. That his death coincidcs with the triumph of the Australian Ballet in London is an ironic
testamcnt to his great contribution to Australia's cultural life and achicvement.
CANBERRA July 1992 E0. Jul. 92 19: 18 No. 014 P. 01/ 01
